Meaning: Related to X / Style of X
Completed by acheiving a result; also outward
Completed by reaching an endpoint / finishing; also down/onto

Example 1: წამოდი • come with me / let's go

Example 2: მ-აქვს • I have it (it is to me)
უკეთებს • he makes it for him

Meaning: Using X / By means of X (Instrumental)
With / Next to / At someone's place
From (a person or source) / Made of
